General.Name: Wuhan LinControl Automotive Electronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Wuhan LinControl Automotive Electronics Co., Ltd. provides automotive power electronic control systems in China. Its products include gasoline vehicle engine management systems, electric vehicle power electronic control systems, and hybrid electric vehicle power electronic control systems. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Wuhan, China.

2.Name: Mr. Junfa  Yu
2.Title: Deputy GM, Core Technical Staff & Director
